title.rendered: Achieve the Physique of Your Dreams With a Non-Surgical Butt Lift in New York City!

content.rendered:
There are many reasons one might want to enhance the shape and size of the buttocks. For some, disproportionate size can cause insecurity and make it hard to find clothing that fits right. For others, it may simply be a matter of preference! With a non-surgical butt lift in New York City, our expert team can help you achieve the physique you’ve been dreaming of.

Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery is the premier destination for any and all cosmetic procedures. We offer exceptional and effective non-surgical butt lifts in a beautiful, discreet, and comfortable environment. Led by renowned double board certified facial plastic surgeon, Dr. Steven Pearlman, we provide men and women all over the world with passionate and attentive patient care.

The rundown on a non-surgical butt lift in New York City

So, you might have heard of a Brazilian butt lift. Commonly shortened to BBL, this surgical procedure tightens, lifts, and enlarges the buttocks for a more curvy hourglass figure. While this procedure may be a viable option for some, we are excited to offer a non-surgical solution!

Luckily, at Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery, we offer a safe, non-invasive alternative to a surgical BBL. Using cosmetic injectables, we can augment the butt and enhance your figure, all while keeping you safe and comfortable. Our non-surgical butt lift in New York City treats:

  • Skin laxity of the buttocks
  • Asymmetry 
  • Low volume
  • Uneven skin texture
  • Hip dips

What are cosmetic injectables?

We achieve incredible non-surgical butt lift results through the use of dermal filler cosmetic injectables. Cosmetic injectables refer to a variety of non-invasive treatment options at Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery for increasing volume, inducing collagen growth, and more!  

In the case of a non-surgical butt lift in New York City, we use injectables to augment, enhance, and define specific aspects of the physique. This gives us the freedom to craft your desired figure without incisions and anesthesia! 

Additionally, we utilize dermal fillers and other cosmetic injectables to prevent and alleviate signs of aging such as fine lines and wrinkles on the face and hands. When you use dermal fillers, you can achieve a more youthful, restored appearance overall! 

Why choose a non-surgical butt lift in New York City?

Surgery is a huge investment. For some, it just simply isn’t an option. But that doesn’t mean you can’t have the physique you desire. There are a multitude of reasons why choosing a non-surgical approach can be even more beneficial than a surgical one! 

Cost-efficiency

The cost of a non-surgical BBL depends on the amount of augmentation desired, but without surgical costs factoring in, you don’t have to spend big bucks to achieve beautiful results. 

No downtime

Traditional BBLs require around 6 weeks of recovery. For some, it’s simply not plausible to put life on hold for that long. 

However, a non-surgical butt lift in New York City requires absolutely no downtime! Your daily life won’t change in any way, except for walking away feeling and looking your absolute best.

We do recommend skipping a workout immediately following your treatment, but you can return to the gym as soon as the next day. 

Meet the injectables

We perform our non-surgical butt lift using 2 safe and effective dermal fillers. Let’s take a closer look at each of them!

Radiesse

Radiesse is a type of injectable made out of calcium hydroxylapatite (CaHA), a substance naturally found in the body. It is known for its long-lasting results made possible by very tiny, smooth calcium hydroxylapatite microspheres. 

These microspheres stimulate your body’s natural collagen output so that, over time, Radiesse actually encourages your body to grow volume on its own! We use this injectable in your non-surgical butt lift to achieve a fuller, more voluptuous physique. The use of Radiesse will also improve the texture of your skin – resulting in smoother, tighter skin on your derrière. 

Sculptra Aesthetic

This injectable, also known as a Poly-L-Lactic Acid, is a synthetic sugar made up of many individual lactic acid units. Sculptra Aesthetics is biocompatible, meaning it is non-toxic and safe. So, you can rest easy knowing you’re not putting something harmful in your body.

Like Radiesse, Sculptra Aesthetic stimulates the creation of collagen in your body. We inject it deep into the dermis of the skin, and over the course of 2 to 3 months, increases the volume of your buttocks. 

The process

Our process is straight-forward, safe, and effective. Here’s what your non-surgical butt lift with Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery will look like, from start to finish. 

The consultation

An important step in the process is the initial consultation. We use this time to get to know your aesthetic goals in great depth so that we can customize a treatment plan unique to you. We also go over the details of the procedure with you so you have a clear understanding before your appointment.

During the consultation, we will make recommendations about potential treatment pathways based on your lifestyle, desired results, unique needs, and more!

The procedure

Your provider will use a local anesthetic to numb the area, so you shouldn’t experience any discomfort during the procedure. Using a combination of two fantastic injectables, your expert injector strategically augments and enhances the shape and size of your butt. The treatment typically takes around 30 minutes to complete. 

The recovery

When we say no downtime, we really mean it! We recommend skipping the gym immediately following your treatment, but you can resume all other regular activities right away. 

The results

The injectables help your body produce collagen over the course of 3 to 6 months. You’ll see full results after 6 months, and they can last for up to 2 years!  The volume increase depends on the factors you and your provider discuss during your consultation. Our goal is to get you exactly the results you want to see.

How to maintain results

We recommend ongoing maintenance treatments to keep your non-surgical butt lift looking incredible. Receiving ongoing treatments every few months can increase the longevity of your results. You can also use ongoing treatments to modify the shape and size if you so desire. 

Paired treatment | QWO cellulite reduction

In keeping with our injectables theme, a fantastic treatment to pair with your non-surgical butt lift in New York City is QWO cellulite reduction! 

What is QWO?

QWO (collagenase clostridium histolyticum-aaes) is an FDA-approved cellulite reducing treatment. It is a non-invasive, in-office injectable procedure offered at Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery.

What QWO treats and how it works

Cellulite affects nearly 90% of women. Although it’s common, that doesn’t make it any less frustrating. It’s believed that there are 3 main causes for cellulite: 

  1. Skin that thins over time
  2. Fat cells being pushed against the skin
  3. Fibrous bands that cause tension and dimples 

If cellulite affects your confidence, there is something you can do about it. 

QWO tackles cellulite by breaking up the bands that cause dimpling. When combined with a non-surgical butt lift in New York City, you can achieve absolutely stunning results! If you’re curious whether QWO is a good fit for you, check out our virtual procedure match tool to get expert recommendations.

A little bit about us

As a leader in the medical aesthetics and plastic surgery field, you can expect excellence from Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery at every turn. Offering a finely tuned combination of compassionate care, innovative, state-of-the-art technology, and a highly-skilled team, Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery is your first choice for cosmetic procedures of any kind. 

Led by renowned, double board certified plastic surgeon Dr. Steven Pearlman, our team shares a passion and a commitment to outstanding medical care. Our goal is to help you enhance and elevate your ideal self-image, so that you feel beautiful on the outside and on the inside.  

Take the first step

If you’re ready to enjoy the benefits of a non-surgical butt lift in New York City, schedule a consultation with us today! At Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery, we take pride in the relationships we create with each of our clients. Our consultation allows us to get to know you and your aesthetic goals so we can better help you achieve them! 

Want to get connected with Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery? Sign up for our newsletter to stay up-to-date on upcoming events, specials, and exciting news!
